function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incomplete or inaccurate information conveyed from government to the public","Impact":"Misunderstanding and lack of cooperation from the public","Mitigation":"Ensuring complete and accurate information with transparent communication","Technologies":"Communication technologies, data verification tools","People":"Public, government","Owner":"Government, communication experts"},{"Description":"Unrealistic public demands leading to frustration for the government","Impact":"Frustration and potential breakdown of communication","Mitigation":"Education on risk management, open dialogue with the public, setting realistic expectations","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, data analysis tools","People":"Government, public","Owner":"Government, community leaders"},{"Description":"Lack of expertise and evidence-based decision-making in risk management","Impact":"Poor decision-making and inadequate risk assessment","Mitigation":"Forming expert panels with diverse knowledge and skills, leveraging technology for data analysis and evidence gathering","Technologies":"Expert systems, data analysis tools, knowledge management systems","People":"Government, experts, public","Owner":"Government, experts"}]}
